title: Processes - Approximating Areas with Riemann Sums

content.question: What is the approximation of <math alttext="the integral from 2 to 5, of, the natural log of x, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> found by using a left Riemann sum with three subintervals of equal length?

choices.label: <math alttext="the natural log of 2 plus the natural log 3, plus the natural log of 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of 3 plus the natural log 4, plus the natural log 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of 2 plus the natural log 3, plus the natural log 4, plus the natural log of 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="3 times, open parenthesis, the natural log of 2 plus the natural log of 3, plus the natural log of 4, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the natural log of 2 plus the natural log 3, plus the natural log of 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
